::Surgital::

     Surgital used his free arm to cover his eyes from the bl=
ast of his missile.  He still struggled to release his arm from Lavatron's =
gasp.  Surgital took his free arm, and clenched it into a fist, then attemp=
ted to clunk Lavatron on the top of the head.

sile hits Lavatron, jerking him back, but he doesn't let go of
